function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research on green brand equity in the context of COVID-19 post-pandemic","Impact":"Limited understanding of how firms can cope with the new normal and contribute to environmental protection","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research on green brand equity in the context of COVID-19 post-pandemic","Technologies":"Research methodologies, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, marketing professionals, environmental experts","Owner":"Research institutions, marketing departments, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Innovative products and marketing strategies in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Unforeseen consequences on public health, consumer behavior, and the environment","Mitigation":"Thorough testing, risk assessment, and consultation with health and environmental experts","Technologies":"Product testing technologies, environmental impact assessment tools","People":"Product developers, marketing professionals, public health experts, environmental experts","Owner":"Product development teams, marketing departments, public health organizations, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on consumer behaviors and attitudes","Impact":"Changes in consumer behavior and attitudes that could affect brand image and consumer satisfaction","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and adaptation of marketing strategies, consumer engagement initiatives","Technologies":"Data analytics, consumer behavior tracking tools","People":"Marketing professionals, consumer behavior analysts","Owner":"Marketing departments, market research firms"}]}
